channel.title: Drinking help
channel.description:
hey i was wondering how can i make it so a beer is drinkable? like im guessing something like this
[code]if(playerHasItem(1917,1) && ????????? deleteItem(1917, 1); ////(beer) addItem(1919, 1);////(empty beer glass) sM("You Got Drunk Foo!");[/code]
is this even right lol? and what would the ????? be for like the action can someone please help

item.title: Drinking help
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

[quote=“iluvbarbiez, post:12, topic:340121”]Your all fucking fags.

Try to help him instead?

Go to potions.java, add case 1917. Cba to explain so I make a c&p for you.

		case 1917:
			c.deleteItem(1917, 1); //Delete glass of beer
			c.addItem(1919, 1); //Add empty glass
			c.setAnimation(0x33D); //Drinking animation
			c.sM("You Got Drunk Foo!");
			c.playerSE = 2770;// Start of emotes
			c.playerSEW = 2769;
			c.playerSER = 2769;
			c.playerSEA = 0x326;//End of emotes
			c.updateRequired = true;
			c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			break;[/quote]

thanks man this worked great your the best thank you so much, the rest of you thank you for trying, for those who just randomly posted and spammed like the guy above this post, fuck off and get a life dont post if your not gonna be useless

@Mods: Please lock problem is solved

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

guys the code is if someone has beer, and clicks action “drink” then remove beer add beer glass and do the emote and send a message its that simple why you guys make so complicated only thing i dont know is the action code for the “drink” and i think someone above posted it so when i get home ill try that but thanks guys for trying to help

item.title: Drinking help

@geel9 wrote:

The ??? Is how he thinks he’s going to detect when a player drinks the beer. You need to find the case for clicking an item.

item.title: Drinking help
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if(playersHasItem(beer code, beer amount) && (button for drink)){ deleteItem(beer code, beer amount); addItem(Empty glass of beer code, Empty Glass of beer amount); sendMessage(Message after action); }

If you explained what your ??? were for, I would of helped on it. But as it says the more specific you be, the more help you get. Now an action is nothing WITHOUT THE ACTION! so in between the addItem and the sendMessage You should put the action script of when you drink beer

Read full topic

item.title: Drinking help
item.dc:creator: @iluvbarbiez iluvbarbiez
item.description:
@iluvbarbiez wrote:

Your all fucking fags.

Try to help him instead?

Go to potions.java, add case 1917. Cba to explain so I make a c&p for you.

		case 1917:
			c.deleteItem(1917, 1); //Delete glass of beer
			c.addItem(1919, 1); //Add empty glass
			c.setAnimation(0x33D); //Drinking animation
			c.sM("You Got Drunk Foo!");
			c.playerSE = 2770;// Start of emotes
			c.playerSEW = 2769;
			c.playerSER = 2769;
			c.playerSEA = 0x326;//End of emotes
			c.updateRequired = true;
			c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
			break;

Read full topic

item.title: Drinking help
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

You forgot an emote code for this lol
should be something similar to like
“player.animation(439);”

I don’t know the emote code for drinking beer though.

if(playerHasItem(1917,1)) { deleteItem(1917, 1); addItem(1919, 1); player.animate(CODEHERE); sM("You Got Drunk Foo!");
Hope this helped (other then that it looks decent? i mean you could trim it up a bit)

Try the code i trimmed up a little above ^^
-Emily
Um yeah, make sure you close your ( ) lol
P.S. its always “//” if your going to name stuff, after // its just pointless lol

Read full topic
